metadata.description:
The application features a simple and intuitive user interface that makes it easy for users to input their JSON data, preview the formatted output, and make any necessary adjustments.

It also supports multiple formatting options, including indentation, line breaks, and space trimming. The product is designed to be fast and reliable, capable of handling large JSON data sets with ease.

It is compatible with all modern web browsers and can be accessed from anywhere with an internet connection.
metadata.name: PrettyJSON
